name: ScareCraw
0:
”Alexa open scare craw”
”start scare craw”
”begin scare craw”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: scare craw
des: Just say "Alexa - Open Scare craw", and alexa would say "Warning. A break in had been detected, the police had been notified". Alexa will repeat this for over 10 minutes, with a 10 second pause in between.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
